review.title: “Sales Associate”
review.pros: Pros – J Matheson is a Beautiful Gift Shop with Great customers and great quality products, open environment, walking distance for lunch breaks, Open to working out personal schedule, open to creative input
review.cons: Cons – The shop is in a smaller town, parking can be difficult, some times it is hard to take a break because they are a busy shop.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stay the way you are with personal customer service and constantly changing unique quality products.
